alert.note: Alert for Ozark; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 4:57PM CDT until July 17 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR OZARK AND EASTERN TANEY COUNTIES... At 457 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles southeast of Ava to 9 miles east of Taneyville to near Sparta, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Bull Shoals Lake, Lake Taneycomo, Kissee Mills, Gainesville, Taneyville, Theodosia, Pontiac, Wasola, Sundown, Brixey, Noble, Willhoit, Brownbranch, Hardenville, Protem, Thornfield, Rueter, Bradleyville, Rockbridge and Long Run. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
